title: Antamosi
creator_credit: Ana Kokkinos and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
brief_description: Memories, betrayals and secrets emerge from the past when Katina’s mother comes from Greece to visit the family. As the truth about the family’s war-time involvement is revealed, the bitter embrace between mother and daughter is observed by Katina’s own daughter Sophia who must play her own role in this moving drama of estrangement.
